OOC: I'm not sure, can the Tripred Base fly shielded ... in fact ... rAuq, we 
need to talk about this...  Oh wait ... there you are.  On a side note, 
concussion missiles would essentially explode with no heat, a concussion wave 
would knock anything back or crush anything immobile.  Thus making them 
effective for both crowd control and heavy assaults.

::Firaxis::
       He smiles inwardly to himself, happy to finally be able to fight.  
Transforming in midair he spirals down at the Tripred base's aft section 
where he knew the engines would be located.  Coming to a stop relative to the 
base he launches a pair of concussion missiles at the ship.

--part1_1a0.b44865a.2af893ed_boundary
